pma:database.name: calendator
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `feature` ( `linkid` varchar(36) NOT NULL, `title` mediumtext NOT NULL, `description` mediumtext DEFAULT NULL, `project` varchar(36) DEFAULT NULL, `use_case` varchar(36) DEFAULT NULL, `components` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`components`)), `punchlists` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`punchlists`)), `tasks` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`tasks`)), `gantt_elements` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`gantt_elements`)), `est_dates` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`est_dates`)), `actual_dates` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`actual_dates`)), `timesheets` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`timesheets`)), `progress` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`progress`)), `issues` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`issues`)), `bugs` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`bugs`)), `testing` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`testing`)), `flags` bit(16) DEFAULT NULL, `x_1` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`x_1`)), `x_2` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`x_2`)), `x_3` longtext CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_bin DEFAULT NULL CHECK (json_valid(`x_3`)), PRIMARY KEY (`linkid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
